summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3703 for the improvement of 5th Avenue Northwest, from West 65th Street to West 70th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45556, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
